title: Stop Making Sports Political | Guests: Sean Hannity & Clay Travis | 8/4/20
description:
The parallels are astounding between now and Germany during the 1936 Olympics as even sports become political. BLM activists in Louisville, Kentucky, demanded businesses follow their list of demands or face harassment. The Federal Reserve is preparing for an economic reset while many Americans are still out of work. Sean Hannity runs through his first book in 10 years, “Live Free or Die,” and the future of America if President Trump loses. The city of Dallas canceled the Young Americans for Liberty’s conference at the last minute and South Dakota Gov. Kristi Noem gives the latest. Clay Travis, founder and lead writer of OutKick, talks the politicization of sports and the NBA’s latest China debacle. A massive explosion rocked downtown Beirut.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
